title: Paintings of Terror - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Comedy   Fantasy   Horror   Mystery   Shounen Ai   Supernatural
tags: Calm Protagonist   Character Growth   Clever Protagonist   Cold Love Interests   Death   Depictions of Cruelty   Devoted Love Interests   Ghosts   Gore   Handsome Male Lead   Hard-Working Protagonist   Manly Gay Couple   Modern Day   Monsters   Mystery Solving   Power Couple   Proactive Protagonist   Protagonist Falls in Love First   Shameless Protagonist   Slow Romance   Smart Couple   Strong Love Interests   Survival Game   Teamwork   Unlimited Flow   Weak to Strong
author: 瑆玥
description:
If Ke Xun could do it again, he would have never left his house to go out and flirt with guys, even if it would mean getting beaten to death.

Weren’t they supposed to have just been taking shelter from the rain in a museum and looking at some erot*c paintings while they were at it? Why…did they enter the world inside a painting?!

Mu Yiran: Every single one of us is acting out a role in the painting.

Ke Xun’s eyes lit up: How do we get into an erot*c painting?

Mu Yiran gave him a long, drawn-out look: Shut your eyes and lie down.>
